title.rendered: Authenticity at your fingertips: Eldorado Stone samples now available online

content.rendered:
SAN DIEGO, CA – Authentic architectural stone veneer from Eldorado Stone is so similar to its natural counterpart that, just like natural stone, color and texture can vary slightly from online photos or brochures. That’s why, for the first time, Eldorado Stone is making samples of its award-winning nationwide profiles available for purchase online so homeowners and trade professionals can experience the genuine look, feel, color and scale of Eldorado Stone before committing to a specific profile for a project.

TWEET THIS: For the first time ever, @EldoradoStone architectural #stoneveneer samples are available for purchase online. http://bit.ly/2ei3kUw

“Sample boxes of Eldorado Stone have been available through our distributors for years, but we wanted to make the experience of transforming an exterior or interior space even more convenient for homeowners and builders,” said Ramsay Hawfield, Vice President of Marketing and Product Development at Eldorado Stone. “Now, it’s easy to choose a profile or color on the Eldorado Stone website and experience first-hand how the texture and color of the stone play in any space.”

Samples can be purchased directly from the Eldorado Stone website and include a 12-inch by 12-inch section of manufactured stone straight from the production line. Samples cost $25.00 each and arrive via ground shipping at no additional charge.

The handsomely boxed samples are available in signature Eldorado Stone profiles, including classic profiles such as the weathered Fieldledge® and bold Cliffstone®, as well as new profiles from the Modern Collection, like the unique planking appearance of Vantage30 and calming Zen24.

More information about Eldorado Stone samples can be found by visiting an authorized Eldorado Stone dealer or on the newly redesigned Eldorado Stone website at eldoradostone.com.
